name: Cubenomics: A puzzle game
description:
Cubenomics is a physics puzzle game. Draw lines to guide the ball around a cube using gravity and puzzle mechanics. Activate all buttons to open the exit and bring the ball to the goal to solve each puzzle.



Use the various tools provided to draw out your own unique answer. Draw around the cube from any perspective and edit your lines to fit that perfect solution. Utilise puzzle obstacles and gravity to bring the ball wherever you want. There is always more than one solution to each puzzle, so solve each puzzle however you want!



Guide the ball to each button to enable them, activate them all to open up the exit. Make sure you don't block your path to the exit on the way!



Play through 80 puzzles in 8 different settings. Each introducing their own unique theme, mechanics, or ramping up the difficulty from the previous.
